attributes.action: Decline to attend any speech made by Donald Trump in the Houses of Parliament.
attributes.background: If the Prime Minister will not withdraw the invitation of a State visit then we respectfully ask MPs to peacefully demonstrate our opposition to the policies and behaviour of Donald Trump, by declining to attend any speech made by him in the Houses of Parliament during his State visit.

rejection.details: This is a decision for individual MPs, not the Government or Parliament as a whole.
